# MTL4BlendState.unspecialized

**Case**

Defers determining the blending stage.

## Declaration

```swift
case unspecialized
```

## Discussion

Behaves as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4BlendState/disabled] until you specialize this pipeline value.
